snippet: The Goldwater Hospital for chronically ill patients, on Roosevelt Island, was shuttered in December to make room for a science and technology campus.
abstract: Photographer and architect Charles Giraudet has documented shuttered building that once housed Welfare Hospital for Chronic Diseases, later known as Goldwater Hospital, located on Roosevelt Island; buildings are slated for demolition.
lead_paragraph: The Goldwater Hospital for chronically ill patients, on Roosevelt Island, was shuttered in December to make room for a science and technology campus.
